posts.post_content:
I've completed my T205-style Honus Wagner custom-cards. I've done three colors of the "with cap" variety and one color of the "no cap" portrait. I have a few of each from my initial "press run" that I can make available for $3 apiece postpaid.

Each card is in the original 1-7/16" x 2-5/8" format in full-color, front and back, on stock replicating the originals. You can drop cash, check or M.O. in an envelope to Bob Lemke, P.O. Box 8, Iola, WI, or PayPal to [url]crystalsdad1979@yahoo.com[/url].

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=12460&d=1263508945[/IMG]

Bob,
I will take one of each....money sent via paypal.

Joshua

[quote name="Marty" post=775084]You've got to be kidding...[/QUOTE]

What is there to be kidding about?

Edited to say: Nice cards, Bob!
I agree, very cool cards Bob! Nice work :)
